name: Bat Simulator 3D
description:
Be a Bat and FLY, BATTLE ANIMALS, AND EXPLORE CAVES :)

FLY LIKE A BAT - Easy controls so you can live your life like a Bat! Fly into the sky to protect the forest and collect magic gems :)

3D SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the magical forest :)

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest :)

CREATE A BAT FAMILY - Create, unlock, and raise your bat family to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies :)

BE A REAL-LIFE BAT - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this forest and explore caves, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey :)
